casebody.data:
QUIRIGHETTI v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 16, 1922.) No. 56. E. Paul Yaselli and Vincent E. Ferretti, both of New York City, for plaintiff in error. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City (William Berg, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
